text: Claire Bloom (born February 15, 1931) is an English stage and movie actress. She has been working for over 60 years. She has played leading roles in many movies. She played Terry in the movie Limelight. She played Theodora in The Haunting (1963) Bloom was born in London, England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:English stage actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from London Category:1931 births Category:Living people
title: Claire Bloom
